channel.title: I'm new with servers
channel.description:
Hi, i'm trying to develop a server, and new with coding. If anybody could post some helpful advice on the following questions, that would be great. ~Stixx~
1) How do I set up shops and set up items in the shops 2) How do I set up Pk/No Pk areas 3) How do I give players different items to start out with 4) Setting up experience per hit 5) Setting up Special Effects (dummy room effects, glows, ect.) 6) Setting up fun games/puzzles that don't cause lag 7) Setting up commands (A MUST)
I got my server online. Hiring coder soon.
Thanks for the help and I hope you all get to see my server sometime. :)
Also, again, I'm very new at coding, so if i don't understand your comments, you'll know why. ;)
#Edit: If anyone finds links to tuts for 1-7, that'd be great.#

item.title: I'm new with servers
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Nate Mod Nate
item.description:
@Mod_Nate wrote:

Stixx the best way to figure out what you need it just to scroll through the pages on the Tutorials =)

Read full topic

item.title: I'm new with servers
item.dc:creator: @newyorkowns newyorkowns
item.description:
@newyorkowns wrote:

[quote=“Casey., post:2, topic:105499”]Try server developement/tut sections for 1-7.
For 8…
Use ham or no-ip.
No-ip.org
Register
click host
create the ip for it.
Then do the download.
Click the happy face thing.
And ur no-ip is up.

or use ham:)
hamachi.com
download
create newnetwork
name
pass
turn on.
advertise
players are on.[/quote]

to download hamachi its hamachi.cc and yeah most of the things there are in the tut section =]

Read full topic

item.title: I'm new with servers
item.dc:creator: @Stixx Stixx
item.description:
@Stixx wrote:

Hi, i’m trying to develop a server, and new with coding. If anybody could post some helpful advice on the following questions, that would be great.
~Stixx~

  1. How do I set up shops and set up items in the shops
  2. How do I set up Pk/No Pk areas
  3. How do I give players different items to start out with
  4. Setting up experience per hit
  5. Setting up Special Effects (dummy room effects, glows, ect.)
  6. Setting up fun games/puzzles that don’t cause lag
  7. Setting up commands (A MUST)

I got my server online. Hiring coder soon.

Thanks for the help and I hope you all get to see my server sometime.

Also, again, I’m very new at coding, so if i don’t understand your comments, you’ll know why.

#Edit: If anyone finds links to tuts for 1-7, that’d be great.#
